query:
SELECT 'volante' as tipo, v.nome, tv.token 
FROM tokens_volante tv 
JOIN volantes v ON tv.volante_id = v.id 
WHERE tv.token = 'ZLBXf3Rfqh455bRfsHIytC0xaovesbrOnSZEkotFfW1duQKBDq0nw5W2OWONNDny'
UNION ALL
SELECT 'loja' as tipo, l.nome, tl.token 
FROM tokens_loja tl 
JOIN lojas l ON tl.loja_id = l.id 
WHERE tl.token = 'ZLBXf3Rfqh455bRfsHIytC0xaovesbrOnSZEkotFfW1duQKBDq0nw5W2OWONNDny';
